short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The no-code, data extraction and work automation platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of data with the Hexomatic Chrome extension. Instantly analyze websites and gather essential insights to speed up your sales, marketing, and research tasks.

Key Features:
- Tech Stack Analyzer: Discover the building blocks of any website to identify potential competitors or partners.
- Domain Whois Lookup: Quickly access domain registration details to inform your business strategies.
- Content Analyzer: Evaluate the effectiveness of website content with a single click.
- Screenshot Capture: Create professional-quality screenshots for presentations or reports.
- QR Code Generator: Instantly generate QR codes for any web page.
- Grammar & Spelling: Detects grammar and spelling mistakes
- Accessibility audit: Check page compliance with accessibility standards

Automate Your Workflow
Hexomatic is more than just an extension. It's a powerful automation platform that lets you build custom workflows to streamline tasks and boost productivity.

Start saving time and making smarter decisions today with Hexomatic!

Check our website to find out more: https://hexomatic.com
